title: Tina Knowles, Michelle Obama, Carla's Reality Update, PETA and more.
itunes:title: Tina Knowles, Michelle Obama, Carla's Reality Update, PETA and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve opens up the show and he is wearing some alligator shoes. Shirley is calling PETA. Steve tells us about the time that he met Tina Knowles. Michelle Obama discusses life after the White House. The crew have date ideas for Valentine's Day. There is a spoiler alert in Carla's Reality Update and news of a spin-off. Steve has a very special Valentine's deal for Sand and Soul that extends to the end of the month. There is a special club in New York that Tommy is not tall enough to be a part of. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about a way to have peace of mind and lower blood pressure, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
